The mission may be technically challenging and require advanced equipment and technology.
Adverse weather conditions may impact the mission and cause delays or cancellations.
The deep-sea environment may require specific training and preparation to ensure the safety and well-being of the explorers.
Communication and coordination between the explorers and support teams may be challenging due to the distance and depth of the mission.
There may be cultural or legal challenges related to the mission, particularly with regards to international cooperation and collaboration.
